title: Raggedy Ann and Andy
additional-notes: The cover title was consistently 'Raggedy Ann + Andy', or 'Raggedy Ann and Andy', but the inside title of the first issue, which was also the first to be renewed, was 'Raggedy Ann + Raggedy Andy'.
Some individual 'Raggedy Ann and Andy' comics were also published as part of Dell's 'Four Color Comic' series, both before and after this dedicated series.
